actions.text: Amendment SA 359 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 76.

Amendment SA 359 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S2296-2301; text; CR S2297) To reduce spending and decrease the risk of drastic energy price increases by prohibiting further greenhouse gas regulations for the purposes of addressing climate change.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 359 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 76.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 359 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 76.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 359 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Inhofe.

purpose: To reduce spending and decrease the risk of drastic energy price increases by prohibiting further greenhouse gas regulations for the purposes of addressing climate change.
